scripts.predev: if [ -f .mongo_pid ]; then (kill $(cat .mongo_pid) || true)  && rm .mongo_pid; echo "killed old server!"; fi
scripts.mongo: echo "starting new server..." && mongod -f models/mongodb/mongod.conf & echo $! > .mongo_pid
scripts.windows: echo "starting new server..." && mongod -f models/mongodb/wmongod.conf & echo $! > .mongo_pid & node api.js
